overview: Tom Mix plays Jack Kilmeny, an Englishman who owns a gold claim in the U.S. Jack has two problems -- his worthless partner Curly (Jack Nelson), and the British company on the land next to his who hope to jump his claim.
tagline: A Fight for a Woman's Heart. A Story in Which a Grizzly Bear Spoils a Picnic and Starts a Romance.
title: Fighting for Gold
